Auto Hyde

A simple, Sinatra-based gem I wrote. It provides a single route for a GitHub post-receive hook to rebuild a Jekyll site.

AutoHyde 0.1.1 Released

10 Dec 2010

If you were looking for an easy way to rebuild your Jekyll site after a push to GitHub, here it is.
